isis.stitle: CE 200, CE 300 - HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - Install - Fender Mounted Cross-View Mirrors

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. MIRROR BASE MOUNTING STUD WITH LOCK NUTS AND WASHERS

step1.para: With an assistant holding the mirror base assembly, locate and align the base mounting holes and the fender mounting holes. Insert the mounting bolts through the fender assembly, place the fender reinforcing plate over the bolts, install lock washers and nuts. Tighten until snug.
Install the mirror bracket attachment clamps ( Figure 83, Item 4) to the mirror main support bracket ( Figure 83, Item 3).
Locate the mirror / fender support bracket ( Figure 83, Item 9, and align with mounting hole in fender ( Figure 82, Item 1).
Insert the mounting bolts through the bracket end and fender section. Install the flat washer and lock nut on the underside of the fender section and hand tighten ( Figure 82, Item 1).
Place the opposite end of support bracket in attachment clamp ( Figure 83, Item 4) on mirror main support bracket.
Insert bolt, lock washer and nut and tighten.
Locate and align the mirror support bracket end mounting hole with the mounting hole in the side surface of the hood ( Figure 83, Item 1) assembly.
Insert the mounting bolt through the bracket end and hood section. Install the flat washer and lock nut.
Place the opposite end of support bracket in attachment clamp on mirror main support bracket.
Follow the same procedure for the opposite side mirror assembly.
